001package gbw.melange.common.shading.services;
002
003import com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable;
004import gbw.melange.common.shading.IManagedShader;
005import gbw.melange.common.shading.errors.ShaderCompilationIssue;
006
007import java.io.IOException;
008
009/**
010 * <p>IShaderPipeline interface.</p>
011 *
012 * @author GustavBW
013 * @version $Id: $Id
014 */
015public interface IShaderPipeline extends Disposable {
016    /**
017     * Compiles all registered programs.
018     * Also stores all static shaders on disk as textures and replace the actual program with one sampling that if caching is enabled.
019     * @throws gbw.melange.common.shading.errors.ShaderCompilationIssue if any.
020     */
021    void compileAndCache() throws ShaderCompilationIssue, IOException;
022
023    /**
024     * <p>registerForCompilation.</p>
025     *
026     * @param shader a {@link IManagedShader} object
027     */
028    void registerForCompilation(IManagedShader<?> shader);
029
030    /**
031     * Clears all content in the dedicated output folder.
032     * Shouldn't necessarily break anything, but is essentially a manual cache invalidation method.
033     */
034    void clearCache();
035
036}
